translations: n.连词；[语]连接词；[数]合取（conjunction 的复数形式）

sentences.translation: 不强调“连接”词(连接词、文章)。

sentences.sentence: VOICE: Were there any planetary conjunctions during those years?
sentences.translation: 在那些年里有没有发生行星的结合呢？

sentences.sentence: Coordinating conjunctions, except the sentence connectors yet and so.
sentences.translation: 除句子连接词yet和so之外的并列连词。
